data.lyric:
[ti:Fifteen (Taylor's Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Fearless (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Fifteen (Taylor's Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:03.74]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift
[00:07.49]Composed by：Taylor Swift
[00:11.24]You take a deep breath and you walk through the doors
[00:14.67]It's the mornin' of your very first day
[00:20.27]You say hi to your friends you ain't seen in a while
[00:24.81]Try and stay out of everybody's way
[00:30.53]It's your freshman year and you're gonna be here
[00:34.78]For the next four years in this town
[00:39.87]Hopin' one of those senior boys will wink at you and say
[00:44.84]"You know I haven't seen you around before"
[00:52.28]'Cause when you're fifteen and somebody tells you they love you
[00:59.46]You're gonna believe them
[01:02.47]And when you're fifteen feelin' like there's nothin' to figure out
[01:13.10]Well count to ten take it in
[01:16.18]This is life before you know who you're gonna be
[01:24.67]Fifteen
[01:36.55]You sit in class next to a redhead named Abigail
[01:40.48]And soon enough you're best friends
[01:46.02]Laughin' at the other girls who think they're so cool
[01:50.45]We'll be outta here as soon as we can
[01:55.84]And then you're on your very first date and he's got a car
[02:01.92]And you're feelin' like flyin'
[02:05.79]And your mama's waitin' up and you're thinkin' he's the one
[02:10.33]And you're dancin' 'round your room when the night ends
[02:15.37]When the night ends
[02:17.80]'Cause when you're fifteen and somebody tells you they love you
[02:24.94]You're gonna believe them
[02:27.89]And when you're fifteen and your first kiss
[02:33.50]Makes your head spin 'round
[02:38.57]But in your life you'll do things greater than
[02:42.95]Dating the boy on the football team
[02:47.92]I didn't know it at fifteen
[03:02.51]When all you wanted was to be wanted
[03:07.24]Wish you could go back and tell yourself what you know now
[03:16.95]Back then I swore I was gonna marry him someday
[03:20.83]But I realized some bigger dreams of mine
[03:26.49]And Abigail gave everything she had
[03:30.74]To a boy who changed his mind
[03:35.76]And we both cried
[03:38.21]'Cause when you're fifteen and somebody tells you they love you
[03:45.41]You're gonna believe them
[03:48.32]And when you're fifteen don't forget to look before you fall
[03:59.48]But I've found time can heal most anything
[04:02.89]
[04:03.48]And you just might find who you're supposed to be
[04:08.43]I didn't know who I was supposed to be
[04:15.21]At fifteen
[04:22.22]La-la-la la-la-la la-la-la-la
[04:27.17]La-la-la la-la-la la-la-la-la
[04:32.19]La-la-la la-la-la
[04:35.14]Your very first day
[04:39.84]Take a deep breath girl
[04:42.72]Take a deep breath as you walk through the doors
data.trans:
[ti:Fifteen (Taylor's Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Fearless (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.74]//
[00:07.49]//
[00:11.24]你深吸一口气走进校园
[00:14.67]这是开学第一天
[00:20.27]你向有一阵子不见的朋友打了声招呼
[00:24.81]试着不挡住别人的去路
[00:30.53]你刚升上一年级
[00:34.78]接下来的四年都要待在这个小镇
[00:39.87]希望有个男孩会盯着你说
[00:44.84]“我以前没看过你。”
[00:52.28]因为当你15岁的时候 有人说爱你
[00:59.46]你会相信那是真的
[01:02.47]当你15岁的时候 会觉得一切没有什么好质疑的
[01:13.10]好吧，数到十
[01:16.18]这是你认清自己之前的生活
[01:24.67]当你15岁的时候
[01:36.55]坐在红发的Abigail旁边
[01:40.48]很快的你们就成为了好朋友
[01:46.02]嘲笑那些以为自己很酷的女孩
[01:50.45]嚷着很快就会离开这里
[01:55.84]第一次约会的时候 他开车来接你 
[02:01.92]你感觉就像在飞
[02:05.79]你妈妈还在等门，你视他是你的唯一
[02:10.33]你在房间里手舞足蹈直到天亮
[02:15.37]直到天亮
[02:17.80]因为当你15岁的时候 有人说爱你
[02:24.94]你会相信那是真的
[02:27.89]15岁时的那个初吻
[02:33.50]让你神魂颠倒
[02:38.57]但在往后的生命里
[02:42.95]有着比跟足球队男孩交往还棒的事情
[02:47.92]但我15岁的时候并不知道
[03:02.51]当你所有的期望都还未实现
[03:07.24]希望可以时光倒流 告诉自己现在所了解的事情
[03:16.95]回想过去 我曾经发誓有天我要嫁给他
[03:20.83]但我发现我还有远大的梦想
[03:26.49]Abigail 将她的所有献给了
[03:30.74]那个变心的男孩
[03:35.76]我们都哭了
[03:38.21]因为当你15岁的时候 有人说爱你
[03:45.41]你会相信那是真的
[03:48.32]当你15岁的时候 别忘了在坠入爱河之前看仔细
[03:59.48]我发现时间可以治愈大部分的伤痛
[04:02.89]
[04:03.48]只要认清自己将成为怎样的人
[04:08.43]但我并不知道我该成为怎样的人
[04:15.21]15岁的时候
[04:22.22]//
[04:27.17]//
[04:32.19]//
[04:35.14]你的第一天
[04:39.84]深呼吸吧 女孩
[04:42.72]在进入那扇门前做个深呼吸
